summary: Changes the Tritop from SkyMoMod into a furrier creature that\'s suited for Skyrim\'s cold climate.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Skyrim Monster Mod Tritop Replacer
Version: 1.0
Date: 20-06-2012
Category: Creatures
Author: StarX
Source: Skyrim Nexus

=================
Requirements:
=================

Skyrim (patched to the latest version)

Skyrim Monster Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9694)

=================
Description:
=================

This mod changes the Tritops in Skyrim Monster Mod into a more furry beast that\'s better suited for Skyrim\'s cold climate.

=================
Installation
=================

Extract this archive to any folder.

1. Copy the meshes and texture folders to the data folder in your Skyrim install directory. 


=================
Un-Installation:
=================

Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

=================
Contact:
=================

StarX @ TES Alliance or Skyrim Nexus

=================
Credits:
=================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to mr. Siika for the original Tritop mesh
Thanks to Dogtown1 for the modified furry Tritop mesh

Textures: StarX

=================
Tools Used:
=================

Insanity\'s ReadMe Generator
Photoshop

=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================

Contact me for permission if you want to use these textures for your own project. Do not upload this file to another host without my explicit permission. 

=================
Changelog:
=================

1.0 Initial release
author: StarX
